name: Fraz-Urb'luu (A)
immunities: poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing that is nonmagical

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: Fraz-Urb'luu's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 23). Fraz-Urb'luu can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: alter self (can become medium-sized when changing his appearance), detect magic, dispel magic, phantasamal force * 3/day each: confusion, dream, mislead, programmed illusion, seeming * 1/day each: mirage arcane, modify memory, project image

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Fraz-Urb'luu fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Fraz-Urb'luu has advantage on saving throws against spell and other magic effects.

traits.name: Undetectable
traits.desc: Fraz-Urb'luu can't be targeted by divination magic, perceived through magical scrying sensors, or detected by abilities that sense demons or fiends.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Fraz-Urb'luu makes three attacks: one with his bite and two with his fists.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (4d6 + 9) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (4d8 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

legendary.name: Tail
legendary.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 31 (4d10 + 9) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is also grappled (escape DC 24). The grappled target is also restrained. Fraz-Urb'luu can grapple only one creature with his tail at a time.

legendary.name: Phantasmal Killer (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.desc: Fraz-Urb'luu casts phantasmal killer, no concentration required.
